name: animation
tagline: A Gallery of Animations in Statistics and Utilities to Create Animations
body:
# animation

## Introduction

This is an R package to create and export animations to a variety of formats (HTML/JS, GIF, Video, PDF), and it also serves as a gallery of statistical animations. See some [live examples here](http://vis.supstat.com/categories.html#Animation-ref).

## Installation

To install the stable version on CRAN:

```r
install.packages('animation')
```

To install the GitHub version:

```r
if (!require('devtools')) install.packages('devtools')
install_github('animation', 'yihui')
```

This package is generated by roxygen2:

```r
install.packages('Rd2roxygen')
library(Rd2roxygen)
rab('animation', install = TRUE)
```

## Contact

Bugs and feature requests can be sent to [Github issues](https://github.com/yihui/animation/issues). Pull requests are also welcome.
